attributes.additional_details: To raise the amount of Carers allowance from £56 to £150  weekly ,we Carers save our government billions each week as if we did not look after the person we cared for it would cost the government £450  a week so somewhere there needs to be a increase ,as Carers we face so much deprivation becouse we care that's criminal so as a a carer if would love to see that change for myself and all .
